description: File API handle failed across channels for FBV related parameter screening relevant Required by V15 Request, State Check, and More

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is available Required.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp of when the request is created in second

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The service can identify identity through access_token. We can limit for multiple use and access it here

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Request must be must id64.

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error state if an error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if an error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: shop_id
response_fields.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop

response_fields.name: jx_reason_code
response_fields.description:
1: expired
2: Apply not for validation
3: Apply to be error
4: More Transfer

response_fields.name: jx_reason_id
response_fields.description: Return by default. The business FBV request audit ID

response_fields.name: fbv_type
response_fields.description:
1. Jux fbv sale error
2. Other fbv sale error

response_fields.name: notice_deadline_time
response_fields.description: The expired time of fbv failed means it end soon after the reason error would be canceled

response_fields.name: remove_state
response_fields.description: This identify the jwt fbv request for once and once. It will block the shop id item

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: This identity for jwt fbv request for error tracing

error_codes.description: Shop and fbv is not related
System error caused by sync site

notes: The documentation appears to be for a shop vendor error query API. The endpoint URLs are fully specified including the domain. The API seems to handle FBV (possibly Fulfillment By Vendor) related errors and status checks.
